actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to provide housing and community development assistance for Indians and Alaska Natives.
short_title: Indian and Alaska Native Housing and Community Development Act
subjects: Department of Housing and Urban Development

summary.text: Indian and Alaska, Native Housing and Community Development Act - Creates, in the Department of Housing and Urban Development, an Office of Indian and Alaska Native Affairs, through which the Secretary of HUD shall carry out functions relating to Indian and Alaska Native Housing and Community Development. Creates the Office of Assistant Secretary for Indian and Alaska Native Affairs. Directs the Assistant Secretary to submit certain reports to Congress, and conduct an annual conference on Indian and Alaska Native Housing.

titles.title: Indian and Alaska Native Housing and Community Development Act
A bill to provide housing and community development assistance for Indians and Alaska Natives.
